address.title: Select Address
address.description: Found multiple addresses for this postcode. Please select yours.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the BinDays API. If this persists, please check the integration status or report an issue on GitHub: https://github.com/BadgerHobbs/BinDays-HomeAssistant/issues
error.no_addresses_found: We matched your postcode but couldn't find any addresses. Please report this council issue at https://github.com/BadgerHobbs/BinDays-API/issues
error.invalid_postcode: The supplied postcode is invalid. Please double check and try again.
error.unsupported_council: Your local council is not currently supported by BinDays. You can request support by opening an issue at https://github.com/BadgerHobbs/BinDays-API/issues
error.no_collector_found: No waste collector could be found for this postcode. Please check the postcode is correct or report it at https://github.com/BadgerHobbs/BinDays-API/issues
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs or report an issue at https://github.com/BadgerHobbs/BinDays-HomeAssistant/issues
